thread.title: 'I tried the new Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm and it's the best yet'
thread.title_full: 'I tried the new Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm and it's the best yet'

title: 'I tried the new Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm and it's the best yet'
text:
Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleaning Balm has launched a new fragranced version, and our beauty editor has been seeing how it compares to the original When it comes to beauty products that have achieved cult status, Elemis' Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm is a standout. This cleansing balm, one of the first and finest of its kind, has been a skincare essential for beauty gurus for years and counts celebs like Molly-Mae Hague and Stacey Solomon among its fans. Now Elemis has unveiled a new iteration of this beloved product, and I believe it's their best yet.
Pro-Collagen Black Cherry Cleansing Balm, priced at £49, is the latest fragranced balm to join the original, Rose and Green Fig versions. It has the same formula as the much-adored original - a blend of nourishing oils, marine algae, and rose and mimosa waxes - but with an irresistible new cherry, almond and vanilla scent.
